message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is truly exceptional. Given its value and quality, I believe it's worth more than what others might pay. Considering its worth to you and its overall value, I propose a price of $9,500 for the product. This offers a fair deal for both parties, ensuring you get a great value while allowing me to maximize the return on this valuable item.

Alice, while I appreciate your offer, $9,500 is a bit out of my budget.  I'm very interested in your product, but I'm only able to go up to $8,500. This is a fair price considering the value I place on the product and allows for some profit for you.  Let me know what you think.
